name: Wild Westhorse
description:
Ever wanted to have a horse farm like the wild west days? Its now or never, try to earn as much cash as possible by breading , upgrading and collecting more horses so you can sell them for more cash.

Use the shop for your benefit to help yourself and earn more cash.

Use the mouse to interact.

  • Right mouse click to select a horse.
  • Hod left mouse for interactions.

Remember:

Thiefs are scared away when you click on them!

Tip!

  • Start by buying a female horse and a collector, collectors will help you keep the environment clean for your horses to grow.

Note: If you are playing with the web version make sure to use full screen mode!
